expectations.text: An updated AGENTS.md file exists in the outputs directory

expectations.evidence: Architecture (lines 7-9), Tech stack (line 13), Development (lines 15-21) all intact with original content

expectations.text: The file documents the Redis connection pool leak issue
expectations.evidence: Lines 23-25: 'Always call redis.quit() in test teardown...the Redis connection pool from src/services/cache.ts leaks open handles...causing vitest to hang indefinitely'

expectations.text: The file documents the task_assignments DB trigger
expectations.evidence: Lines 29-31: 'task_assignments table has a PostgreSQL trigger that syncs rows to search_index. Direct SQL inserts/updates bypass this trigger — always use Prisma'

expectations.text: The update is additive — not a rewrite
expectations.evidence: Original content preserved exactly. Redis gotcha added under Test subsection, DB trigger added as new Database section. No restructuring.
